title: Historian, former defense minister Jānis Arveds Trapāns dies
summary_full: Jānis Arveds Trapāns, a Latvian historian and public figure in exile, who served briefly as Latvia's defence minister in the 1990s, has passed away at the age of 87, according to the American Latvian Association (ALA).
summary_public: Jānis Arveds Trapāns, a Latvian historian and public figure in exile, who served briefly as Latvia's defence minister in the 1990s, has passed away at the age of 87, according to the American Latvian Association (ALA).
